price: Ní ọjọ́ tí Allāhu yóò gbé gbogbo wọn dìde pátápátá, wọn yó sì máa búra fún Un gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọ́n ṣe ń búra fún yín. Wọ́n ń lérò pé dájúdájú àwọn ti rí n̄ǹkan ṣe. Gbọ́! Dájúdájú àwọn gan-an ni òpùrọ́.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعٗا فَيَحۡلِفُونَ لَهُۥ كَمَا يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٍۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
